titleInfo.title: Interior of Saliman's Bar and Grill

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''# 99 Salimon's Bar and Grill, 1920 Larimer St. Donor: Ann Julius Saliman''

mods.abstract: Four men inside Saliman's Bar and Grill a popular downtown Denver establishment located on Larimer Street. Two of the men are working behind the counter and two are a customers with beverages.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, page 44.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
